title: Nursing Practice Competency Enhancement: Educational Digital Game Design Utilizing Gamification

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of core game mechanics and foundational instructional design principles
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can create educational game design documents by applying the seven principles of gamification (learner analysis, goal setting, game content integration, etc.).
Learners can suggest at least three learning motivation strategies utilizing characteristics of digital games (reward systems, level design, etc.).
Learners can implement a simple educational game prototype through team-based collaboration and incorporate learner-centered design feedback.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
